title: A short summary of the principal controversies between the Church of England, and the church of Rome being a vindication of several Protestant doctrines, in answer to a late pamphlet intituled, Protestancy destitute of Scripture-proofs.
author: Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to William Sherlock. cf. NUC pre-1956.
